title: Turkey
subtitle: Experience Istanbul, Troy, Ephesus, and Cappadocia.
short_description: Journey to magical Turkey, where East meets West. See the mesmerizing confluence of landscapes, cultures, religions, and history. Experience Istanbul, Troy, Ephesus, and Cappadocia. This adventure includes all hotel accommodations and ground transportation, guide / tour leader, most breakfasts & dinners, entrance fees, and the tipping "kitty".
